chk_completed_task_timestamp.name: chk_completed_task_timestamp
chk_completed_task_timestamp.value: (is_completed = false) OR (is_completed = true AND completed_at IS NOT NULL)

chk_processed_after_received.name: chk_processed_after_received
chk_processed_after_received.value: processed_at IS NULL OR processed_at >= received_at

chk_sent_after_processed.name: chk_sent_after_processed
chk_sent_after_processed.value: sent_at IS NULL OR (processed_at IS NOT NULL AND sent_at >= processed_at)
